projects.title: OpenCRVS
projects.description:
OpenCRVS (Civil registration & Vital Statistics) is a digital public good to help achieve universal civil registration and evidence-based decision making in all country contexts. OpenCRVS consists of multiple servers which run in Docker containers and requires Node JS.

 I worked on several parts of this large application. As an example, I worked onperformance management dashboard and developed several complex atomic pixel perfect UI components like month range picker, location picker filters. I have also written influx queries that fetches nationwide data.

projects.title: LAMT
projects.description: LAMT Suite refactor - Loan Account Management Tool (LAMT) system refactor. Complete refactor of Java Springboot, AWS, Vue-Nuxt frontend tech stack to containerized node microservices monolithic architecture with NextJS frontend. I have written complete NextJS application from scratch and mentored one colleague to contribute as a co-author. I have also written NestJS graphql resolvers, REST apis.

projects.title: CloudCampus24
projects.description: Cloudcampus24.com helps students, parents or guardians to access notice, attendance records, transcript, financial statement, online fees payment, student profile and many more. I have developed the android application from scratch with react native. I have also deployed the first release of the application in play store.
